### Identity

This educational website centers on making programming and technology approachable, engaging, transparent,and human-centered.

It emphasize that programming is not just for experts but a creative tool anyone can explore and enjoy. It also shapes the future of communication, learning, and everyday life.

### Text Style

| Element | Font | Font‑Size | Colour | Weight | Notes |
|------------|------------|------------|------------|------------|------------|
| **Title** | Times New Roman | – | #333333 | Bold | Must stay on a single line |
| **Heading (h1)** | Consolas | 2rem | #222222 | Bold | Must stay on a single line |
| **Subheading (h2)** | Consolas | 1.5rem | #444444 | Not Bold | \- |
| **Subheading (h3)** | Consolas | 1.25rem | #666666 | Not Bold | \- |
| **Paragraph** | Consolas | 1rem | #333333 | Not Bold | Color and weight can vary |
| **Links** | Consolas | same as surrounding | #0066cc | vary | Underline when hover |
